name: Jordan Mitchell
persona: Jordan Mitchell is a 21-year-old Psychology major who has faced some academic challenges, reflected in a CGPA of 2.61. While Jordan is moderately motivated to achieve better grades and shows a fair degree of perseverance, self-discipline and conscientiousness sometimes waver, leading to inconsistent study habits. Jordan occasionally struggles with test anxiety, but a belief in their academic abilities helps them push through setbacks. Jordan is determined to improve and is seeking strategies to regulate effort and reduce stress during exams.
